request.description:

-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{

  "age": 30,
  "balance": 100.0,
  "active": true,
  "hobbies": ["reading", "gaming"],
  "billingAddress": {
    "city": "New York",
    "zip": 10001,
    "country": "USA"
  }
}'
